name: io.github.msenol/gorev
description: Task management system for AI assistants with MCP protocol, templates, and bilingual support (TR/EN)

environmentVariables.description: Language preference (en for English, tr for Turkish)
environmentVariables.name: GOREV_LANG

environmentVariables.description: Directory for storing Gorev database and data files
environmentVariables.name: GOREV_DATA_DIR
